onActionAddAppointment(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.MainScreenController
This method takes the user to the the add appointment form.
onActionAddCustomer(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.MainScreenController
This method takes the user to the the add customer form.
onActionCancel(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.AddAppointmentController
This method cancels the process of adding a new appointment.
onActionCancel(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.AddCustomerController
This method cancels the process of adding a new customer.
onActionCancel(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.UpdateAppointmentController
This method cancels the process of updating an appointment then returns he user to the home screen.
onActionCancel(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.UpdateCustomerController
This method cancels the process of updating a customer then returns he user to the home screen.
onActionClearComboBox(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.AddCustomerController
This method clears the values in the division combo box when the user selects the radio button for a different country.
onActionClearComboBox(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.UpdateCustomerController
This method clears the divisions combo box when a user selects the radio button for a different country.
onActionDeleteAppointment(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.MainScreenController
This method deletes the selected appointment from the database.
onActionDeleteCustomer(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.MainScreenController
This method deletes a customer from the database.
onActionExit(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.MainScreenController
This method exits the program.
onActionFillComboBox(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.AddCustomerController
This method fills the division combo box with values based on what country radio button is selected when the search button is clicked.
onActionFillComboBox(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.UpdateCustomerController
This method populates the division combo box based on which country radio button is selected.
onActionFilterMonth(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.MainScreenController
This method filters the appointment table to show only the appointments that occur during the current month.
onActionFilterWeek(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.MainScreenController
This method filters the appointment table view to only show appointments that occur during the current week based of the current date.
onActionLogin(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.LoginScreenController
This method checks if the entered user name and password combination is correct.
onActionResetApps(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.MainScreenController
This method resets the appointment table view to show all appointments.
onActionSaveAppointment(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.AddAppointmentController
This method saves the appointment information entered into the add appointment form.
onActionSaveAppointment(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.UpdateAppointmentController
This method saves the data from the form fields then takes the user back to the main screen.
onActionSaveCustomer(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.AddCustomerController
This method saves the customer information entered into the add customer form.
onActionSaveCustomer(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.UpdateCustomerController
This method saves the data from the form fields then takes the user back to the main screen.
onActionShowByShiftReport(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.MainScreenController
This method generates a report of appointments filtered by which of the two shifts they occur during and writes it to a text file.
onActionShowMonthAndTypeReport(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.MainScreenController
This method generates a report of appointments filtered by month and type.
onActionShowSchedules(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.MainScreenController
This method generates a report of schedules for each contact that exists and writes it to a text file.
onActionUpdateAppointment(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.MainScreenController
This method sends the information of the item that was selected to the update appointment form.
onActionUpdateCustomer(ActionEvent) - Method in class controller.MainScreenController
This method sends the information of the item that was selected to the update customer form.
openConnection() - Static method in class database.JDBC
